nodes.text: Hive command was a command unit within the Tarkin Initiative that oversaw operations on Hivebase-1, a classified Tarkin Initiative research and development space station that was protected by a scaraphyte swarm. In 0 BBY, the Son-tuul Pride sought to trade the Rebel Alliance general Hera Syndulla in order to enter the space station, and steal the memories of 0-0-0. Commander Yewl was able to capture the mercenary group before they could complete their mission.
